title: Game-Based Language Learning for Adult Professionals: Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and acquisition of fundamental terminology related to professional tasks
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized learning in a digital device-provided environment. Strengthened gamification elements to drive user engagement. Real-time feedback system via formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize 50 job-related specialized foreign language terms in context within a mobile game environment.
Learners can resolve language problems that may arise in real work environments with 80% accuracy through in-game simulation tasks.
Learners can maintain interaction with peer learners at over 70% through weekly leaderboards and badge systems, sustaining learning motivation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
